question: When is Micro, Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (MSME) Day celebrated every year?
explanation:
The Micro, Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (MSME) Day is celebrated every year on June 27, across the world.
The United Nations General Assembly declared the day to raise public awareness of the contribution of MSMEs to sustainable development and the global economy. The agencies of UN including UNCTAD, UNIDO among others organised a webinar on the theme of “MSMEs: first responders to societal needs”.
